Utterance: Hi there! It’s good to see you again. How have you been since our last session?
Hi! I’ve been doing well. I reached out to my friends like we talked about, and we had a great time!
That’s fantastic! I’m glad to hear that. How did it feel to reconnect with them?
It felt really good. We went out for dinner and just caught up. I realized how important those connections are for me.
That’s wonderful insight! It sounds like you’re prioritizing your relationships, which is so important. Did you notice any changes in your mood or energy after spending time with them?
Definitely! I felt more energized and motivated afterward. It was a nice break from work.
That’s great to hear. It sounds like socializing has a positive impact on your well-being. Have you been able to incorporate mindfulness into your routine since our last session?
Yes, I’ve been trying it in the mornings. It’s been helpful, especially on days when I feel anxious.
That’s excellent! Mindfulness can be a powerful tool. Have you noticed any specific benefits from practicing it regularly?
I feel more centered and less reactive throughout the day. It helps me focus better on my tasks.
That’s a significant benefit! It sounds like you’re making great strides in managing your anxiety and self-doubt. Have there been any new challenges or feelings that have come up for you lately?
I’ve been feeling a bit overwhelmed with some upcoming deadlines at work. I want to make sure I’m producing quality work.
It’s understandable to feel overwhelmed, especially with deadlines approaching. How are you currently managing that stress?
I’ve been trying to break tasks into smaller pieces, but I still feel the pressure.
That’s a good strategy. It can also be helpful to remind yourself of your accomplishments and strengths. What are some past successes you can draw on during this busy time?
I completed a short film project recently that I was really proud of. It received positive feedback from my peers.
That’s a fantastic achievement! Reflecting on that success can help boost your confidence. Would you like to create a plan for managing your workload while maintaining your well-being?
Yes, I think that would be helpful.
Great! Let’s outline your tasks and prioritize them. How many projects do you have on your plate right now?
I have three main projects due in the next few weeks.
Let’s break those down. What’s the first project, and when is it due?
The first one is a short film, and it’s due in two weeks.
Perfect! What are the steps you need to complete for that project?
I need to finalize the script, shoot the scenes, and then edit it.
Let’s set some deadlines for each of those steps. How about you aim to finish the script by the end of this week?
That sounds doable.
Awesome! And then we can plan to shoot next week. How does that sound?
That works for me!
Great! We’ll check in on your progress next session. Remember to be kind to yourself during this busy period.
I will! Thank you for helping me stay organized.
You’re doing the hard work, and I’m here to support you. Is there anything else on your mind today?
I think I’m good for now. I feel more focused after this conversation.
I’m glad to hear that! Remember, progress takes time, and it’s okay to seek support when needed. I look forward to hearing how everything goes next time!
Me too! Thanks again, Ellie.
You’re welcome! Take care, and see you soon!
Bye!
